name: Enforce emojis are wrapped in `<span>` and provide screenreader access.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/accessible-emoji at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce all elements that require alternative text have meaningful information to relay back to end user.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/alt-text at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce `<a>` text to not exactly match "click here", "here", "link", or "a link".
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/anchor-ambiguous-text at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce all anchors to contain accessible content.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/anchor-has-content at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce all anchors are valid, navigable elements.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce elements with aria-activedescendant are tabbable.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/aria-activedescendant-has-tabindex at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce all `aria-*` props are valid.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/aria-props at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce ARIA state and property values are valid.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/aria-proptypes at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that elements with ARIA roles must use a valid, non-abstract ARIA role.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/aria-role at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that elements that do not support ARIA roles, states, and properties do not have those attributes.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/aria-unsupported-elements at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that autocomplete attributes are used correctly.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/autocomplete-valid at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce a clickable non-interactive element has at least one keyboard event listener.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/click-events-have-key-events at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that a control (an interactive element) has a text label.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/control-has-associated-label at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce heading (`h1`, `h2`, etc) elements contain accessible content.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/heading-has-content at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce `<html>` element has `lang` prop.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/html-has-lang at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce iframe elements have a title attribute.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/iframe-has-title at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce `` alt prop does not contain the word "image", "picture", or "photo".
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/img-redundant-alt at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that elements with interactive handlers like `onClick` must be focusable.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/interactive-supports-focus at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that a `label` tag has a text label and an associated control.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/label-has-associated-control at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that `<label>` elements have the `htmlFor` prop.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/label-has-for at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce lang attribute has a valid value.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/lang at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforces that `<audio>` and `<video>` elements must have a `<track>` for captions.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/media-has-caption at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that `onMouseOver`/`onMouseOut` are accompanied by `onFocus`/`onBlur` for keyboard-only users.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/mouse-events-have-key-events at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that the `accessKey` prop is not used on any element to avoid complications with keyboard commands used by a screenreader.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-access-key at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Disallow `aria-hidden="true"` from being set on focusable elements.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-aria-hidden-on-focusable at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce autoFocus prop is not used.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-autofocus at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce distracting elements are not used.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-distracting-elements at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Interactive elements should not be assigned non-interactive roles.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-interactive-element-to-noninteractive-role at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Non-interactive elements should not be assigned mouse or keyboard event listeners.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-noninteractive-element-interactions at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Non-interactive elements should not be assigned interactive roles.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-noninteractive-element-to-interactive-role at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: `tabIndex` should only be declared on interactive elements.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-noninteractive-tabindex at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce usage of `onBlur` over `onChange` on select menus for accessibility.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-onchange at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce explicit role property is not the same as implicit/default role property on element.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-redundant-roles at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that non-interactive, visible elements (such as `<div>`) that have click handlers use the role attribute.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/no-static-element-interactions at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforces using semantic DOM elements over the ARIA `role` property.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/prefer-tag-over-role at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that elements with ARIA roles must have all required attributes for that role.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/role-has-required-aria-props at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce that elements with explicit or implicit roles defined contain only `aria-*` properties supported by that `role`.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/role-supports-aria-props at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce `scope` prop is only used on `<th>` elements.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/scope at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website

name: Enforce `tabIndex` value is not greater than zero.
description: See description of ESLint rule jsx-a11y/tabindex-no-positive at the eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y website
